verses.name: Matthew 5:45
verses.text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven: for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good, and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust.

verses.name: Matthew 5:46
verses.text: For if ye love them which love you, what reward have ye? do not even the publicans the same?

verses.name: Matthew 5:47
verses.text: And if ye salute your brethren only, what do ye more than others? do not even the publicans so?

verses.name: Matthew 5:48
verses.text: Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.
